content.text:
[@GCU Prosthetic Conscience](@Yr0KQDRj3y2STr8MKAhSp88JMckaeLNn/dwfaYB64q8=.ed25519) [@صفر](@uR5GhJwABZuZwhy9mI2hFYkTP0IMRG2LZkqpTkgcR1g=.ed25519) 

You two may be interested in the discussion on blocking: %F46h+hDFp3t80eoG+6KDHMUBUDiaprdDjmSwwnpVkPo=.sha256

People who want moderation should have moderation, and being able to subscribe to the blocks of your trusted friends *seems* like it could bring the positives of moderation to SSB without promoting anyone to the role of "universal moderator".
